Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Ampicillin (0.03 - 16 mcg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of aerobic streptococci
Streptococcus spp. other than Streptococcus pneumoniae
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel Ampicillin addition for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of aerobic streptococci.
Indications for Use Summary: For determining antimicrobial susceptibility of aerobic streptococci (other than Streptococcus pneumoniae) to Ampicillin using the MicroScan MICroSTREP plus Panel, with results obtained visually or via the MicroScan WalkAway instrument.
